name: Semantic Wave Operator
intent: Generate dynamic, wave-like evolution of semantic representations, enabling superposition, interference, and resonance.
algebraic\_properties: ψ generates a one-parameter group U(t) \= exp(t ψ) on R.
If ψ is skew-adjoint w.r.t. a semantic inner product, it preserves semantic norms: ||U(t)r|| \= ||r||.
Linearity of ψ implies semantic superposition of solutions.
constraints: ψ must be compatible with the adjacency-induced Laplacian L where L encodes the adjacency structure.
ψ and Π together must define a collapse mechanism from semantic potentials to concrete outcomes.
